data.title: DARLINGTON BOROUGH COUNCIL
data.meta_description: View DARLINGTON BOROUGH COUNCIL's available training options, pass rate and contact details for Business administrator (level 3). You can also check their employer reviews and any other apprenticeship training courses that they offer.
data.text:
The Learning & Skills Service is the external training arm of Darlington Borough Council offering apprenticeships in a range of sectors led by highly qualified and experienced tutors.

Employers will benefit from:

The latest technology used in class-room based study

High-tech workshops for development of practical skills

Industry expert tutors with many years experience

Bespoke and flexible training and assessment procedures to suit business needs

Full time Employer Engagement Officer and expert trainers on hand to answer any queries

Small, personable service

Grants may be available for employers taking on apprentices based within the Tees Valley Combined Authority (Terms and Conditions apply).
